intro: Psychotria chlorotica var. bahiensis, commonly known as the Bahia Psychotria, is a species native to Brazil. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many plants with medicinal and ornamental value. The plant is characterized by its elliptical, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, typically found in tropical rainforests. The plant is also noted for its potential alkaloid content, which may have pharmacological significance.
